title: The Great Mill race
creator_credit: Edinburgh Film Productions and Robin Crichton
brief_description: An unusual look at the Scottish woollen industry. A fictional race is organised between a number of mills to produce a tweed suit in record time. Follows the race from sheep-shearing to finished article.
description: An unusual look at the Scottish woollen industry. A fictional race is organised between a number of mills to produce a tweed suit in record time. Follows the race from sheep-shearing to finished article.
